Package edu.ntnu.Backend.service

Class UserSubjectService

java.lang.Object
edu.ntnu.Backend.service.UserSubjectService
@Service public class UserSubjectService extends Object
A class meant to use the access-point made to the usersubject table in the database. This class uses the methods from the UserSubjectRepository

    • findAllUsersInSubject

      public List<UserSubjectDAO> findAllUsersInSubject(int schoolYear, String subjectCode)
      A method to find all users within a subject.
      Parameters:
      schoolYear - the school year of the subject.
      subjectCode - the subject code of the subject.
      Returns:
      Returns a list of all the userSubjectDAO objects found.

    • findByUserId

      public List<UserSubjectDAO> findByUserId(int userId)
      A method to find all subjects for a user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the user you want subjects for.
      Returns:
      Returns a list of UserSubjectDAO objects found for this user.
